subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Baylor’s Perry Jones III is a 6-foot-11 forward with N.B.A. potential, but his critics want to know why he does not always score like a star.
snippet: Baylor’s Perry Jones III is a 6-foot-11 forward with N.B.A. potential, but his critics want to know why he does not always score like a star.
